import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Select;


public class joinnow {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
FirefoxDriver d1=new FirefoxDriver();
d1.get("http://passbrains.com/");
d1.manage().window().maximize();
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='registertype']").click();
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='expbut']/a/span").click();
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='first_name']").sendKeys("sasmita");
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='last_name']").sendKeys("Tripathy");
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='email']").sendKeys("sasmita.rout2111@gmail.com");
Select dropdown = new Select(driver.findElement(By.id("country")));
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='cityc']").sendKeys("Banglore");
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='zip']").sendKeys("560010");
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='street']").sendKeys("panthur");
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='gender2']").click();
Select dropdown = new Select(driver.findElement(By.id("year")));
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='exp']").sendKeys("4");
d1.findElementByXPath(".//*[@id='register-merged']/div[4]/div/input[3]").click();
d1.close();
	}
}
